ns:common.topic.description: Qu is a computer programming language with an open-source interpreter written in C by Marc Krisnanto. It is comparable to Python, Ruby, Perl and many others.\nThe language is semi-dynamic, and optionally strongly typed, with full object orientation. All variables in the language are first class objects.\nThe design and implementation focuses on compactness and speed, using the GNU Lightning Just In Time compiler.
rdfs:label: Qu

ns:common.document.text: Qu is a computer programming language with an open-source interpreter written in C by Marc Krisnanto. It is comparable to Python, Ruby, Perl and many others.\nThe language is semi-dynamic, and optionally strongly typed, with full object orientation. All variables in the language are first class objects.\nThe design and implementation focuses on compactness and speed, using the GNU Lightning Just In Time compiler (JIT).

ns:type.object.name: Qu
